Class UserController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.leenmeij.app.controllers.UserController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:

    public class UserController
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener
    Here we handle showing screens, actionlistners and other events We also make a few tables
    Author:
    Deam Kop (s1075228), David
